item.title: MIUI V13.0.1.0.SKLTRXM Recovery update for Redmi Note 10S Turkey
item.description:
New Stable Recovery update available!

Device: Redmi Note 10S Turkey

Codename: rosemary

Version: V13.0.1.0.SKLTRXM | 12.0

Size: 3.2 GB

MD5: 876f8131a9fad8c4d69196dc915ec6c6

Changelog:
[MIUI 13]
New: "Crystallization" super wallpapers
New: A new widget ecosystem with app support
Optimization: Improved overall stability
[System]
Stable MIUI based on Android 12
Updated Android Security Patch to June 2022. Increased system security.
[Wallpaper]
New: "Crystallization" live wallpapers
[More features and improvements]
New: Apps can be opened as floating windows directly from the sidebar
Optimization: Enhanced accessibility support for Phone, Clock, and Weather
Optimization: Mind map nodes are more convenient and intuitive now

Download: Here
